name: InfinityGaming
description: "Infinity Gaming is the first platform to combine gaming and Esports with DeFi. Our main goal is to build a structure in the space for gamers to be able to monetize their love for gaming and make a sustainable living doing what they love to do. PLAY Token is the official coin for Infinity Gaming. Infinity Gaming has regular cash prize tournaments hosted by AAA Streamers and Content creators where the community can participate in the action and have a chance to win! "
